solution_line_template: Herman buys himself and 3 team members breakfast {days_per_week} days a week so that's {num_people_eating}*{days_per_week} = {meals_per_week} breakfast combo meals
Each combo meals costs ${cost_per_meal} and he buys {meals_per_week} of them a week so that's {cost_per_meal}*{meals_per_week} = $<<{cost_per_meal}*{meals_per_week}={weekly_cost}>>{weekly_cost}
Over a {project_duration_weeks} week period he spends {project_duration_weeks}*{weekly_cost} = $<<{project_duration_weeks}*{weekly_cost}={total_breakfast_cost}>>{total_breakfast_cost} on breakfast
